p:
We further investigated whether these compounds inhibited lytic reactivation by detecting RFP expression (which represents early lytic reactivation) in iSLK.219 cells using the HCS System. Our results indicated that 7 of the 15 antiviral compounds mentioned above showed significant inhibitory effects on KSHV early lytic reactivation (
Table 1 ), while the other 8 compounds may target other steps such as processes involved in assembly and egress [ 33].
